features: COMFORTABLE HAND FEELING - The animal hamster mouse has passed multiple color modulation and hand feel test, reducing the stress caused by prolonged use of the mouse,helping maximize your feeling of use!

NOVELTY CUTE MOUSE - Creative hamster shape, add fun to the typing process; Both right and left button are designed on ears and the roller wheel is on the top of the head,no need to change your operation habbit
PLUG AND PLAY - Tiny wireless receiver conveniently slots into your computer's USB port, taking up minimal space. Powered by one AA battery ( not included )
STABLE CONNECTION - The 2.4 GHz wireless mouse provides a powerful, reliable connection, break the limitation of messy cable, effective up to 10 meters of range
【PERFECT GIFT】Perfect christmas gift for men women mom dad daughter wife boyfriend grandparents grandma grandpa teenage boy girl sister teacher brother coworker neighbor husband

WIDE COMPATIBILITY - Well compatible with Windows7/8/10/XP, Vista7/8 and Linux etc. Fits for desktop, laptop, PC, Macbook and other devices; Perfect for work and entertainment in home or office; Backed by 1-Year Limited Warranty

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: works just fine and is very cute. i find it is very comfortable to use and got used to the shape very quickly, although i have small hands- i could imagine a person with large hands would find this awkward to use. i use it for both work and casual gaming, and it works perfectly fine. it does shut off automatically after a few minutes of idling, but it turns right back on after one click without any noticeable delay.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Super cute and has a comfortable shape, it also works perfectly right out of the package. Might have to get another one as my mom also is obsessed and keeps stealing mine haha

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s shorter than regular mouse
reviews.reviewText: Because it’s shorter than regular wireless mouse, it makes clicking weird for a little bit. It’s definitely not for shooting games lol. It’s has a soft click sound.Smooth, and comfy! Very cute.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent mouse for small handed individuals
reviews.reviewText: This mouse did the job for almost two years, purchased in October 13th, 2020, and death August 29th, 2022.Pros:-For me personally, this mouse fit perfectly in my hand. *****However, my hands are really small, so this might pose a problem for others.******-Battery life was great. I only needed to replace the batteries probably three times at most in the time it lived.-Very adorable. Got many compliments on it.-Clicks very quietly. Never anything that bothered me.-No connection issues, pointing and clicking never failed.Cons:-Mine had a really bright red light that I could see through the body of the mouse. This didn't affect its practicality, just a visual thing that it might have been better without.-Randomly, probably only a month into ownership, the scroll button stopped working properly. Using it would cause jittery scrolling that did not align with my actual scrolling. However, I just used my trackpad after this happened (I am on a laptop) to scroll, and the mouse for pointing and clicking. For those who are using this for a PC, I would recommend a different mouse to ensure that you wont have that problem.Overall, solid mouse, great price, very cute. Recommend for those with small hands on laptops.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This mouse, or hamster as it is, is a very pretty colour, is super cute, and feels great on the hand! No complaints.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars stopped working after 5 months
reviews.reviewText: It's super cute and clicks quietly and comfortable to hold but sadly started skipping around and stopped working shortly after. i recommend it for short term use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute and works well
reviews.reviewText: My 8 year old loves this mouse! It paired up instantly with her computer and it works great. Super cute and unique 😍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute but a little quirky
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. If this were just about looks I would absolutely give this mouse a 5/5. It is soooo adorable and I love it. That said, it does come with some weird quirks so I can't bring myself to give it five stars. Let's at least start with the good. Again. It. Is. ADORABLE! The silicone it is made from is soft and the size fits well in my hands. If you have larger hands, it may be too small for you. My favorite feature is that after several minutes of non use it automatically turns off to save your battery.Now, for the bad. First and foremost the construction of this mouse isn't the best. Again the silicone is nice but the mouse feels lightweight and a little cheap. There was also a giant split in the face, where the silicone meets the plastic, of mine which I was a little bummed about. You can see it in the pictures above. As far as usability of the mouse, it works ok. Downward scrolling is an issue. It has a really hard time scrolling downwards and will jump up for no reason. I've attached a video that hopefully portays that. If you need scrolling for work/gaming. This may not be the mouse for you.Over all, I'm happy with the mouse. It has some quirks and issues but it's still usable. I wouldn't suggest it for gaming, but for regular computer use its fine. I would say that the price is a little expensive for this mouse. I wouldn't mind so much if mine came without the huge crack in the seam on the face. Maybe this company needs better quality controll.
Super cute and good small size for traveling around
Super comodo, plastico tiene textura suave, esta muy lindo!

The media could not be loaded. I started to second guess the design. But it's actually feeling like a regular mouse. It's kinda light. Battery's helps that. . But still kinda light for a mouse.More novelty then anything really... but fun for the lap top .
